review: Absolutely love my Fire Stick. Almost nothing I can't see between Hulu and Netflix, and commercials and inappropriate content are no longer a nuisance. Who needs cable?  Not me. And it's literally plug and play. Love love it.
author: Bobbie Frye

review: Great product, should have gotten it sooner

review: The Fire TV Stick is the bomb!! You don't need any other device, this one is the only one to purchase. Thanks for a great deal.
